general.description: Megas is a poor world filled with unskilled laborers. It is a world of little value, but many an aspiring Warlord has started a successful campaign by taking Megas and using it as a base of operation.
general.bar: The patrons of this bar are all hard-faced, tight-lipped individuals. They will give you the time of day, but most would rather forget their troubles by applying enough alcohol to them.
